```{r xtable, results="asis", echo=FALSE}

load("TF.RData")
library(xtable)

colnames(TF)[1] <- "#"
tab1 <- xtable(TF[1:30,], 
              digits= c(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,2,0,0,0,0),
              align=  c("c|c||lccrlrl||r|r||r|"))

tab2 <- xtable(TF[31:60,], 
              digits=c(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,2,0,0,0,0),
              c("cclccrlrlrrr"))

print(tab1, type="latex", comment= FALSE, caption.width="p{3}",
      include.rownames= FALSE, scalebox= 0.9,
      hline.after= c(-1, 0, seq(2, nrow(tab1), by=2)))

print(tab2, type="latex", comment= FALSE,
      include.rownames= FALSE, scalebox= 0.9,
      hline.after= c(-1, 1, seq(2, nrow(tab2), by=2)))

```
